oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nutrient retention of vegetated buffer strips on a cropped field and a pasture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Uusi-K채mpp채, Jaana
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The effects of 10-meter wide grass buffer strips (GBS) and vegetated buffer strips under natural vegetation (VBS) on losses of sediment, phosohorus and nitrogen from cropped soil plots has been studied for 15 years on Lintupaju field at Jokioinen. The results have been compared with those from 70-m-long and 18-m-wide plots without buffers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Uusi-K채mpp채, Jaana (2006) Nutrient retention of vegetated buffer strips on a cropped field and a pasture. Paper at: Transport and retention of pollutants from different production systems : NJF seminar 373, Tartu, Estonia, 11-14 June 2006.
